description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models: A group of wind turbines that feed electricity into the electricity grid via electrical substation(s).

contents.name: Name
contents.description: The name of the wind farm.

contents.name: InstalledCapacity
contents.description: The total installed capacity of the wind farm.

contents.description: The tower in the wind farm.

contents.name: CurrentCapacity
contents.description: The current capacity of the wind farm.

contents.name: location
contents.description: The location of the wind farm.
